title: 20 Questions Character Creation
desc:
Creating a new character?
The 20 questions process runs you through the how-to of making a new character step by step.

title: Lore and Setting
desc:
Contains information about the lore and setting of the game.
This includes information about clans, schools, creatures, and places in the world.

title: Rules and Mechanics
desc:
Contains rules or mechanics of the game, such as how dice rolls work or what techniques and skills do.
This section helps figure out the how of playing Legend of the Five Rings.

title: Opportunities
desc: Contains a list of examples of how one can spend opportunity. These are all examples relating to those that are standard in the core rulebook, and can give you a good idea of how to go from there.
